snippet: President Obama announced a ranking system for colleges based on tuition, graduation rates and the percentage of lower-income students who attend, and he ultimately wants to link those ratings to federal aid.
abstract: Pres Obama announces set of ambitious proposals aimed at making colleges more accountable and affordable by rating them and ultimately linking those ratings to federal financial aid; plan is to rate colleges on measures like tuition, graduation rates, debt and earnings of graduates, and percentage of lower-income students who attend.
lead_paragraph: President Obama announced a ranking system for colleges based on tuition, graduation rates and the percentage of lower-income students who attend, and he ultimately wants to link those ratings to federal aid.

headline.main: Obama’s Plan Aims to Lower Cost of College
